name: Fast Break Free Throws
description:
Welcome basketball fans! Fast Break Free Throws is a simple, fun and addictive 3D free throw shooting basketball game with realistic physics. Easy controls that are fun for all ages.

How to Play:
1. Touch and pull back on the ball like a slingshot to adjust the power and angle
2. Release your finger to launch the ball
3. Shoot until you have missed 3 times
